str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
From oregomai; properly, desire, i.e., violent passion (justifiable) abhorrence); by implication punishment.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
